http://www.cityofdwg.net/ |footnotes = }} Dalworthington Gardens is a city in Tarrant County, Texas, United States. It is a suburb of Arlington. The population was 2,293 at the 2020 census. == References == Category:Cities in Texas Category:Settlements in Tarrant County, Texas
